description: This file defines a 'Home' component for a LightningJS-based frontend application. It imports UI components and constructs a scene with animated logo, loader, text, and a button, managing state and transitions with hooks and methods.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: Main component representing the home page, managing visual elements, state, and animations.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through a list of colors, updating the 'color' state at specified intervals.
